High skill ceiling leaves room for continuous improvement in the game. Game is very polished with very minimal bugs, minus cheaters, but overall offers a very enjoyable and competitive experience. The modding and map making community only boosts the playability of the game and provides extra game modes and maps to entertain players. 9/10 would recommend

Started playing this a couple weeks ago, ive logged about 100 hours on it now at the time of this 
edit.
This game runs great on my run of the mill desktop, One of the of the things i enjoy the most is everyone being on a level playing field when it comes to the guns, too many FPS games are plagued by Pay2Win systems where you throw money at them and you get more powerful equipment than someone who chooses to play for free. The maps are excellently designed as well. This game is definitely worth a try since it is free to play now.

Edit #2
600 hours in, im still bad at this game. Still Recommend it.
